title: How to Make a Summer Green Salad

steps.headline: Wash the salad leaves and chop or tear into small pieces.
steps.description: Gather and prepare your remaining salad ingredients. This salad is best made as close to serving as possible.

steps.headline: Place all the Italian dressing ingredients in a blender, blend on medium high speed until emulsified.
Once you develop a light emulsion remove and season to taste.
Place the salad leaves, tomato, celery, cucumber and chives in a glass bowl in layers.
steps.description: Top with the avocado, sliced egg and garnish with the Italian Dressing and salami over egg.

text: Wash the salad leaves and chop or tear into small pieces. Gather and prepare your remaining salad ingredients. This salad is best made as close to serving as possible. Place all the Italian dressing ingredients in a blender, blend on medium high speed until emulsified.  Once you develop a light emulsion remove and season to taste.  Place the salad leaves, tomato, celery, cucumber and chives in a glass bowl in layers. Top with the avocado, sliced egg and garnish with the Italian Dressing and salami over egg. Finished.
